bundle.longDescription: Uma alternativa leve ao WhatsApp Desktop oficial. Enquanto a versão Electron usa 500MB+ de RAM e até 60% da GPU, esta versão Rust/Tauri usa apenas ~1MB de RAM e praticamente zero GPU.

security.csp: default-src 'self' https://web.whatsapp.com https://*.whatsapp.com https://*.whatsapp.net wss://*.whatsapp.com wss://*.web.whatsapp.com; img-src 'self' https: data: blob:; media-src 'self' https: data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://web.whatsapp.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://web.whatsapp.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.whatsapp.com https://*.whatsapp.net wss://*.whatsapp.com wss://*.web.whatsapp.com https://web.whatsapp.com;
